Text.Value: *The bird says nothing, trying to rest.*
Hills... near road...
Yes sir!
Yes ma'am!
I will - thanks to you!
*The bird's eyes are glassy, its breathing weak.*
Prod the bird's wing.
Where did you see these gnolls?
Leave.
Big dog - gnoll... I got too close...
*The bird says nothing. Only the sound of its laboured breath fills the silence.*
*Tearing, you play with the broken tissue. The wing is delicately airy.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Sees dark urge approaching bird, reds-out

Text.Value: They're everywhere up there. Stay away if you can.
Pull yourself away. Leave her alone.
*She lies limply on the table, completely still.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: ChadD: ChadD:<Bird> use Construction anims.  <Nettie> [REUSE] SCENE_DEN_Apprentice_Examine_Bird
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player prods the bird. No response.

Text.Value: Glad you're feeling better. What hurt you?
I'm sorry. Didn't mean to disturb you.
*You are a resplendent carrion eagle before this pitiful jay.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: If possible, we show the wing in the hand of the dark urge as they reflect on it philosophically

Text.Value: I was scouting the hills nearby. Got too close to a gnoll.
You're welcome. Rest up.
*The bird lapses into silence, her head lolling to the side.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: BIrd getting weak/resting, head dips to side

Text.Value: Leave.
Prod her again.
Tear her wings off.
Something took a chunk out of you. What happened?
*Your chest tightens, your fingertips shake.*
That - that feels good. Thank you!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Bird] Cycle - seated pose, head low, weak laboured breathing, recovering from injury

Text.Value: Argh!

EditorData.AnimationTags: Resting Bird reacts in pain to having sore wing poked [player] - poke with one finger, ChadD:<Bird> use Construction anims.  <Nettie> [REUSE] SCENE_DEN_Apprentice_Examine_Bird
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player prods the bird's injured wing

Text.Value: Please... I'm resting...
*You wonder what it would be like to fly as the birds do.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: If possible, we show the wing in the hand of the dark urge as they reflect on it philosophically

Synopsis: Wounded bird is resting on the table after being treated by Nettie. It's probably going to die. If you poke it repeatedly, it will die.
